events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been classified under the refund category based on the customer's request and keywords.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect order.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want a refund for the wrong item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received? This will help us process your refund quickly.
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and I've attached a photo showing the incorrect item delivered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately and you should receive the amount within 5 to 7 business days.
Thanks for handling this quickly. I appreciate the prompt response and look forward to the refund.
The refund process has been completed on our side. Please check your account in a few days to confirm receipt of funds.
We are following up to ensure you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with your experience.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thanks again for the excellent customer service!
We are glad your issue was resolved successfully. Closing the case and wishing you a great day!
